channel.title: Need help on starting a server
channel.description: I was playing moparscape and thought why don't i start my own server since i cant get admin on any other server...but i dont know the first step about it...someone give me the first step on starting a server please?

item.title: Need help on starting a server
item.dc:creator: @hell_boi hell boi
item.description:
@hell_boi wrote:

u need to make a no-ip aswel

go to http://www.no-ip.com and sign up then click add and it should come up with hostname.enter a name then enter a ip then click create host i think…

Read full topic

Java 2 Platform, Standard Edition (J2SE) Development Kit (JDK) 5.0 now whats the compile part?
